results.idea: Cross-sectional z-score on overall sentiment score
results.description: Used single high-coverage field snt1_cored1_score (coverage 0.6329). SUGGESTION1: not applied (single field chosen for clarity). SUGGESTION2: not applied (field is scalar). SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage > 0.6). SUGGESTION4: applied (high userCount and alphaCount -> more reliable). Confidence set to 0.75 based on broad coverage and heavy existing usage.

results.idea: Cross-sectional buy-minus-sell analyst recommendation spread
results.description: Combines buy and sell recommendation percents. SUGGESTION1: applied (two fields). SUGGESTION2: not applied (scalars). SUGGESTION3: applied via ts_backfill for both (coverage ~0.5557). SUGGESTION4: partially applied (buy/sell have reasonable alphaCount). Confidence 0.68 because recommendation spreads historically informative but noisy.

results.idea: Momentum in earnings revision (1-month)
results.description: Time-series momentum on earnings revision. SUGGESTION1: single field to capture pure signal. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill (coverage 0.558). SUGGESTION4: earningsrevision has high alphaCount, applied. Confidence 0.70 due to predictive power of revision momentum.

results.idea: Cross-sectional zscore of earnings surprise scaled by price
results.description: Uses earnings surprise normalized cross-sectionally. SUGGESTION1: single field (focus). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill (coverage 0.5575). SUGGESTION4: moderate alphaCount applied. Confidence 0.66 because surprises often mean-revert.

results.idea: High analyst coverage + positive revisions (composite)
results.description: Combine analystcoverage and earningsrevision to prefer well-covered improving names. SUGGESTION1: applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill to both (coverage <0.6 for coverage field). SUGGESTION4: used coverage and earningsrevision due to strong user/alpha counts. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Dispersion (analyst estimates) predicts volatility risk premium
results.description: Use analyst dispersion dtstsespe as a cross-sectional risk signal. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION2: not applied. SUGGESTION3: applied ts_backfill (coverage 0.5572). SUGGESTION4: moderate alphaCount used. Confidence 0.55 as dispersion is noisy but useful for short-term reversals.

results.idea: Net recommendation percent mean-reversion (short-term)
results.description: Short-term reversal on net recommendation percent. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill used (coverage 0.5557). SUGGESTION4: high alphaCount (3874) increases confidence. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Earnings surprise momentum vs analyst sentiment divergence
results.description: Contrast earnings surprise with analyst net rec percent to find surprises not yet reflected in recommendations. SUGGESTION1: applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION2 not applied. SUGGESTION4: used fields with decent alphaCounts. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Stocks with rising long-term EPS growth estimate
results.description: Time-series increase in longtermepsgrowthest indicates durable upgrades. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill (coverage 0.5413). SUGGESTION4: moderate alphaCount. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Analyst target momentum (uptarget vs downtarget spread)
results.description: Capture net movement in targets via uptargetpercent minus downtargetpercent. SUGGESTION1: applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both (coverage ~0.5508). SUGGESTION4: reasonable alphaCounts used. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Stocks with rising analyst coverage and rising buy percent
results.description: Combine analystcoverage and buyrecpercent for improving interest. SUGGESTION1: applied. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: both fields have good user/alphaCount. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Reversion from extreme sentiment score
results.description: Short-term mean-reversion on extreme snt1_cored1_score values. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3: not applied (coverage >0.6). SUGGESTION4: high user/alphaCount used. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Stocks with high sell rec percent but positive earnings revision (contrarian)
results.description: Target stocks where analysts still sell but earnings revision turns positive. SUGGESTION1: applied (2 fields). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill both. SUGGESTION4: fields have adequate usage. Confidence 0.62 (contrarian riskier).

results.idea: Stocks with persistent high stockrank (momentum)
results.description: Use stockrank time persistence to find momentum. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied (coverage 0.5672). SUGGESTION4: moderate counts. Confidence 0.6.

results.description: Use earningstorpedo to identify upcoming downside. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill (coverage 0.5522). SUGGESTION4: lower alphaCount so confidence reduced. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Confidence 0.5.

results.idea: Cross-sectional IR of earningsrevision over 60 days
results.description: Use ts_ir to capture stable revision signals. SUGGESTION1: single field. SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION4: applied (high alphaCount). Confidence 0.71.
